scripts.build: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd qless-core && make clean && make && cp qless.lua qless-lib.lua ../qless-lua && echo && echo ==================== && echo && echo Lua scripts successfully rebuilt!
scripts.travis: npm run coverage && npm run lint && echo && echo ----------------- && echo 'Everything OK! You are good to commit.'
